name: molgenis-cosas
description: The `molgenis-cosas` repository contains all of the code and scripts used to create and maintain the samples database.

scripts.m:config: dotenv cross-var mcmd config set host %MOLGENIS_HOST
scripts.data:zip: zip -r -j data/zip/cosas.zip data/cosas/* emx/lookups/* && dotenv cross-var mv data/zip/cosas.zip %ZIP_LOCATION%
